response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. It's not just any item; it's an investment that promises significant value and benefits tailored to your needs. Given its exceptional quality and the unique features it offers, we believe it's worth more than $1,000,000 to you. Considering this, I am extending an offer to sell the product to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a chance to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
